member.summary: Exposes methods to interact with Configuration objects for Colleague Self Service Banking Information

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.BankingInformationConfigurationsController.GetAsync
member.summary: Get the Configuration object for Colleague Self Service Banking Information
member.returns: Returns a single banking information configuration object
member.note: Banking Information Configuration is cached for 24 hours.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.BanksController.GetBankAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get a bank resource by its id. This endpoint looks for banks known to Colleague's payroll system as well as the universe of US banks that participate in electronic bank transfers. Canadian banks are only included if they are entered in Colleague's payroll system. For US Banks, the id is the bank's routing id. For Canadian banks, the id is the combination of the bank's institution id and the branch number, separated by a hyphen in the following format: {institutionId}-{branchNumber}
member.param: Routing id of a US bank or institutionId-branchNumber of a Canadian bank
member.returns: A Bank object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PayableDepositDirectivesController.CreatePayableDepositDirectiveAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective)
member.summary: Create a new PayableDepositDirective resource based on the data in body of the request. The BankingAuthenticationToken.Token property is required in the X-Step-Up-Authentication header if account authentication is enabled.
member.param: payableDepositDirective object containing data with which to create a PayableDepositDirective resource.
member.returns: An ActionResult with the created resource in the Content property of the body and the URI of the created resource in the Location Header. The schema of the PayableDepositDirective in the Content property of the response is the same as the schema of the input PayableDepositDirective from the Request

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PayableDepositDirectivesController.UpdatePayableDepositDirectiveAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective)
member.summary:
Updates a Payable Deposit Directive for the current user. This POST request has PUT characteristics, however, only updates to the PayableDepositDirective Nickname and IsElectronicPaymentRequested flag are accepted. Any other updates are ignored.
The BankingAuthenticationToken.Token property is required in the X-Step-Up-Authentication header if account authentication is enabled.
The endpoint will reject updates if: 1. 400 - A deposit's end date occurs before its start date 2. 400 - A PayableDepositDirective has malformed RoutingId, InstitutionId, or BranchNumber 3. 409 - The PayableDepositDirective resource has changed on server - see ChangeDateTime of PayableDepositDirective 4. 409 - The Business Office has a lock on the resource
member.returns: The updated PayableDepositDirective object

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PayableDepositDirectivesController.DeletePayableDepositDirectiveAsync(System.String)
member.summary:
Delete a Payable Deposit Directive.
The BankingAuthenticationToken.Token property is required in the X-Step-Up-Authentication header if account authentication is enabled.
The endpoint will reject updates if: 1. 400 - Something went wrong trying to delete the resource 2. 403 - You attempt to delete a deposit directive that is not yours, or you do not have permission to edit payable deposits. 3. 409 - The Business Office has a lock on the resource, or the server was unable to delete the resource.
member.param: The id of the PayableDepositDirective resource to delete
member.returns: 204 Status if deletion of the resource was successful

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PayableDepositDirectivesController.AuthenticatePayableDepositDirectiveAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirectiveAuthenticationChallenge)
member.summary: Post a request for authentication to create or update a PayableDepositDirective.
member.param: A challenge object containing the required authentication data
member.returns: A BankingAuthenticationToken that can be used to authenticate future Update and Create PayableDepositDirectives. Tokens expire after ten (10) minutes

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PayableDepositDirectivesController.GetStepUpAuthenticationHeaderValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the token used for Step-Up Authentication
member.returns: The first X-Step-Up-Authentication header value, if present. Otherwise null.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PersonsController.GetEmergencyInformationAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get all the emergency information for a person.
member.returns: Returns all the emergency information for the specified person
member.accessComments: Only the current user can get their emergency information.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PersonsController.GetEmergencyInformation2Async(System.String)
member.summary: Get all the emergency information for a person.
member.returns: Returns all the emergency information for the specified person
member.accessComments:
The current user can access all their emergency information.
Permissions can be granted to allow full or partial access to others' information: * Users with VIEW.PERSON.EMERGENCY.CONTACTS can see others' Emergency Contacts and Opt Out status * Users with VIEW.PERSON.HEALTH.CONDITIONS can see others' Health Conditions * Users with VIEW.PERSON.OTHER.EMERGENCY.INFORMATION can see others' Insurance Information, Hospital Preference, and Additional Information
Users with one or more of the above permissions can see other properties not listed as well (such as name and person ID).
If the requested person has a privacy code restriction, the requesting user will need the corresponding privacy code access in addition to the permission(s).
Lacking one or more of the above permissions or privacy code access will result in some properties being null and the "X-Content-Restricted" header being set to "partial"

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PersonsController.PutProfileAsync(System.String,Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.Profile)
member.summary: Updates certain person profile information: AddressConfirmationDateTime, EmailAddressConfirmationDateTime, PhoneConfirmationDateTime, EmailAddresses, Personal Phones and Addresses. LastChangedDateTime must match the last changed timestamp on the database Person record to ensure updates not occurring from two different sources at the same time. If no changes are found, a NotModified Http status code is returned. If required by configuration, users must be set up with permissions to perform these updates: UPDATE.OWN.EMAIL, UPDATE.OWN.PHONE, and UPDATE.OWN.ADDRESS.
member.param: The ID of the person profile to update.
member.returns: Newly updated Profile
member.accessComments: Only the current user can update their profile.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.PersonsController.QueryPersonNamesByPostAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PersonNameQueryCriteria)
member.summary: Retrieves the matching Persons for the ids provided or searches keyword for the matching Persons if a first and last name are provided. In the latter case, a middle name is optional. Matching is done by partial name; i.e., 'Bro' will match 'Brown' or 'Brodie'. Capitalization is ignored.
member.remarks:
the following input is legal
a Colleague id. Short ids will be zero-padded.
First Last
First Middle Last
Last, First
Last, First Middle
member.param: Keyword can be either a Person ID or a first and last name. A middle name is optional.
member.returns: An enumeration of Person with populated ID and first, middle and last names

member.summary: This is the controller for Tax Form Consents.
This constructor initializes the Tax Form Consent controller.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.TaxFormConsentsController.Get2Async(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method gets Tax Form Consent information for a specified person and tax form ID (W-2, 1095-C, etc.).
member.param: The type of tax form: 1099-MISC, W-2, etc.
member.returns: A set of TaxFormConsent2 DTOs
member.accessComments: In order to access consent data, the user must meet one of the following conditions: 1. Have the admin permission (depending on tax form, either ViewEmployeeW2, ViewEmployee1095C, ViewStudent1098, ViewEmployeeT4, ViewRecipientT4A, or ViewStudentT2202A) 2. Have the normal permission (depending on tax form, either ViewW2, View1095C, View1098, ViewT4, ViewT4A, ViewT2202A, View1099MISC or View1099NEC), and be requesting their own data 3. Be a Person Proxy for the user whose 1098 they are requesting (only applies to 1098)

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.TaxFormConsentsController.Post2Async(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.TaxFormConsent2)
member.summary: This method stores a new Tax Form Consent entry.
member.returns: TaxFormConsent2 DTO
member.accessComments: In order to create a consent, the user must have a permission to access their data (depending on tax form, either ViewW2, View1095C, View1098, ViewT4, ViewT4A, ViewT2202A, View1099MISC or View1099NEC), and be requesting their own data.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Base.TaxFormConsentsController.GetAsync(System.String,Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.TaxForms)
member.summary: This method gets Tax Form Consent information for a specified person and tax form ID (W-2, 1095-C, etc.).
member.returns: A set of Tax Form Consents
member.accessComments: In order to access consent data, the user must meet one of the following conditions: 1. Have the admin permission (depending on tax form, either ViewEmployeeW2, ViewEmployee1095C, ViewStudent1098, ViewEmployeeT4, ViewRecipientT4A, or ViewStudentT2202A) 2. Have the normal permission (depending on tax form, either ViewW2, View1095C, View1098, ViewT4, ViewT4A, ViewT2202A, View1099MISC or View1099NEC), and be requesting their own data 3. Be a Person Proxy for the user whose 1098 they are requesting (only applies to 1098)

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Finance.ReceivablesController.GetAccountHolder2Async(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the privacy-restricted account holder information for a specified person.
member.accessComments: Users may request their own data. Additionally, users who have VIEW.STUDENT.ACCOUNT.ACTIVITY permission or proxy permissions can request other users' data
member.returns: The AccountHolder information. Account Holder privacy is enforced by this response. If any Account Holder has an assigned privacy code that the user is not authorized to access, the AccountHolder response object is returned with a X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of account holders. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the specific AccountHolder object.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if user does not have the required role and permissions to access this information

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Finance.ReceivablesController.QueryAccountHoldersByPostAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the information for a single accountholder if an id is provided, or the matching accountholders if a first and last name are provided. In the latter case, a middle name is optional. Matching is done by partial name; i.e., 'Bro' will match 'Brown' or 'Brodie'. Capitalization is ignored.
member.remarks:
the following input is legal
a Colleague id. Short ids will be zero-padded.
First Last
First Middle Last
Last, First
Last, First Middle
member.param: either a Person ID or a first and last name. A middle name is optional.
member.returns: An enumeration of AccountHolder information
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if user does not have the required role and permissions to access this information

In the latter case, a middle name is optional. Matching is done by partial name; i.e., 'Bro' will match 'Brown' or 'Brodie'. Capitalization is ignored.
member.accessComments: Users who have VIEW.STUDENT.ACCOUNT.ACTIVITY permission may request this data
member.remarks:
the following input is legal
a Colleague id. Short ids will be zero-padded.

Last, First
Last, First Middle

member.returns: An enumeration of AccountHolder information. Account Holder privacy is enforced by this response. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the specific AccountHolder object.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if user does not have the required role and permissions to access this information

If any Account Holder has an assigned privacy code that the user is not authorized to access, the AccountHolder response object is returned with a X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of account holders. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the specific AccountHolder object.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if user does not have the required role and permissions to access this information

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequestsController.PostAwardPackageChangeRequestAsync(System.String,Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest)
member.summary: Create a new award package change request based on the data in the awardPackageChangeRequest object form the body of the request. All AwardPeriodChangeRequests as part of the AwardPackageChangeRequest may not be created. Clients should inspect the Status property of each AwardPeriodChangeRequest in the response to verify that its status is Pending. If its status is RejectedBySystem, inspect the StatusReason to determine why the AwardPeriodChangeRequest was rejected.
member.accessComments: Users may create their own data only
member.param: The Colleague PERSON id of the student for whom to create a change request
member.returns: HttpResponseMessage with Content of AwardPackageChangeRequest. When a change request record is successfully created, Status Code will be 201.
member.exception: 400 - Some error occurred while creating the resource. See the error message for further details
403 - You do not have the proper permission to create AwardPackageChangeRequests

409 - An award package change request already exists for the awardYearId, studentId and awardId specified in the input AwardPackageChangeRequest object. The location header in the response indicates the URL of the existing resource.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.FinancialAid.LoanRequestsController.GetLoanRequestAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get a LoanRequest object with the specified Id. A LoanRequest id can be found in a StudentAwardYear DTO
member.accessComments: Users may request their own data. Additionally, users who have VIEW.FINANCIAL.AID.INFORMATION permission or proxy permissions can request other users' data
member.param: The id of the loan request
member.returns: A LoanRequest DTO with the specified id
member.exception: 400, Thrown if no id is specified, if the server is unable to create the LoanRequest object due to data corruption, or if some other unknown error occurs.
403, Thrown if the current user does not have permission to access the requested LoanRequest resource
404, Thrown if the requested resource cannot be found or does not exist

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.FinancialAid.LoanRequestsController.CreateLoanRequestAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.LoanRequest)
member.summary: Create a new pending LoanRequest resource based on the data in the loanRequest argument. Only one pending LoanRequest resource can exist for a StudentId and AwardYear.
member.accessComments: Users may request changes to their own data only
member.param: LoanRequest object containing data with which to create a LoanRequest resource. StudentId, AwardYear and TotalRequestAmount are required, and TotalRequestAmount must be greater than zero
member.returns: HttpResponseMessage containing the new LoanRequest object and a header value that specifies the Location of the new LoanRequest resource. HttpStatusCode is 201 - Created
member.exception: 400, Thrown if the loanRequest argument is null, if the required argument properties are invalid, if the resource's current state prevents the LoanRequest from being created, if an data error was encountered during object creation, or if some unknown error occurred
403, Thrown if the Current user does not have permission to create the LoanRequest resource
409, Thrown if a LoanRequest resource already exists for the requested new LoanRequest, or if a conflicting record lock exists on the server

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.FinancialAid.StudentAwardsController.PutStudentAwardPackageAsync(System.String,System.String,Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.StudentAwardPackage,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Update the awards contained in the StudentAwardPackage resource. The StudentAwards contained in the body of the request must match the resource identifiers in the URL. This performs an all or nothing update.
member.accessComments: Users may make changes to their own data only
member.param: Colleague PERSON id of the student to whom the award belongs
The AwardYear for which the studentAward applies
The StudentAwardPackage containing StudentAward data to update
flag indicating whether to get active award years data only
member.returns: A StudentAwardPackage containing the updated awards
member.exception: 400 - Thrown if the update cannot complete successfully, usually because of bad or mismatched data in the request body
403 - Thrown if the current user does not have permission to update the StudentAwardPackage resource
404 - Thrown if any part of the StudentAwardPackage, award year, award, award period, etc. does not exist

409 - Thrown if the any of the requested changes require review by a Financial Aid counselor or if a pending change request already exists for some or part of the package. Use the AwardPackageChangeRequest resource to submit change requests

members.member:
Create a student's Financial Aid Checklist for the specified award year.
Users may make changes to create their own data.
The Colleague PERSON id of the student for whom to create a checklist The year for which to create a checklist flag indicating whether to get active award years data only An HttpResponseMessage with the Location header that specifies URL of the created resource, and the Content property of the object set to the created checklist 400: Thrown if either of the arguments are null or empty, or some other error occurred while creating the checklist 403: Thrown if you don't have permission to create a checklist for the specified student 409: Thrown if a Checklist already exists for this student and year. The Location header specifies the URL to get the existing resource."

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.FinancialAid.StudentFinancialAidChecklistsController.GetHousingOption(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a student's housing option for a given year
member.note: Uses the ST-VAL table FAFSA.HOUSING.CODES09 to translate the housing code
member.remarks: The housing code is stored in the CS.ACYR record in field 78 (CS.HOUSING.CODE)
member.param: The Colleague PERSON ID to retrieve a housing option for
The Financial Aid award year to retrieve a housing option for
member.returns: A HousingOption object containing the year and housing code for the student

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.FinancialAid.StudentFinancialAidChecklistsController.SetHousingOption(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a student's housing option for a given year
member.note: Uses the ST-VAL table FAFSA.HOUSING.CODES09 to translate the housing code
member.remarks: The housing code is stored in the CS.ACYR record in field 78 (CS.HOUSING.CODE)
member.param: The Colleague PERSON ID to set the housing option for
The Financial Aid award year to set the housing option for
The housing option to set for the specified student/year
Either Y/N, indicates to force an update to CS.HOUSING.CODE even if it is already populated. Otherwise, the value will only be set if it is currently null
member.returns: A HousingOption object containing the year and housing code for the student, either updated with the new value or the current (unmodified) one

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeavePlansController.GetEmployeeLeavePlansV2Async(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all EmployeeLeavePlan objects that you have permission to access. As an employeee, you will have access to only your leave plans. As a supervisor (or the proxy of a supervisor), you will have access to the leave plans of your (or your proxy's) direct reports. As a leave approver, you have access to the leave plans of the employees whose leave requests you handle. This is used by Self Service.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing the effective person id in a proxy scenario
member.accessComments: 1. As an employee you have access to your own leave plans. 2. As a supervisor with the APPROVE.REJECT.TIME.ENTRY permission, you have access to your own leave plans and your supervisees' leave plans. 3. As the proxy of a supervisor, you have access to that supervisor's leave plans and that supervisor's supervisees' leave plans. 4. As an admin, you have access to anyone's leave plans. 5. As a leave approver with the APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST permission, you have access to the leave plans of the employees whose leave requests you handle.
member.returns: A collection of EmployeeLeavePlan objects

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeavePlansController.GetEmployeeLeavePlansV3Async(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all EmployeeLeavePlan objects that you have permission to access. As an employeee, you will have access to only your leave plans. As a supervisor (or the proxy of a supervisor), you will have access to the leave plans of your (or your proxy's) direct reports. As a leave approver, you have access to the leave plans of the employees whose leave requests you handle. This is used by Self Service.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing the effective person id in a proxy scenario
member.accessComments: 1. As an employee you have access to your own leave plans. 2. As the proxy of a supervisor, you have access to that supervisor's leave plans and that supervisor's supervisees' leave plans. 3. As an admin, you have access to anyone's leave plans. 4. As a leave approver with the APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST permission, you have access to the leave plans of the employees whose leave requests you handle.
member.returns: A collection of EmployeeLeavePlan objects

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeavePlansController.QueryEmployeeLeavePlanAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.HumanResources.EmployeeLeavePlanQueryCriteria)
member.summary:
Returns EmployeeLeavePlan objects based on criteria provided.
The endpoint will not return the requested EmployeeTimeSummary if: 1. 400 - criteria was not provided 2. 403 - criteria contains Ids that do not have permission to get requested EmployeeLeavePlan 3. 404 - EmployeeLeavePlan resources requested do not exist
member.param: Criteria used to select EmployeeLeavePlan objects .
member.returns: A collection of objects.
member.accessComments: When a supervisor Id is provided as part of the criteria, the authenticated user must have supervisory permissions or be a proxy for supervisor. If no supervisor Id is provided, only EmployeeLeavePlan objects for the authenticated user may be requested.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeavePlansController.GetEmployeeLeavePlansByGuidAsync(System.String)

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController
member.summary: API end-points related to employee leave rquest.
Initializes a new instance of the EmployeeLeaveRequestController class.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.GetLeaveRequestsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all leave requests for the currently authenticated API user . All leave requests will be returned regardless of status. The endpoint will not return the leave requests if: 1. 403 - User does not have permission to get requested leave request
member.accessComments: If the current user is an employee, all of the employee's leave requests will be returned. If the current user is a leave approver or a proxy of the leave approver, leave requests of all the supervisees will be returned.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing effective person Id
member.returns: A list of Leave Requests

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.GetLeaveRequestInfoByLeaveRequestIdAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the LeaveRequest information corresponding to the input id.
member.accessComments: 1) Any authenticated user can view their own leave request information. 2) Leave approvers(users with the permission APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST) or their proxies can view the leave request information of their supervisees.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing effective person Id
member.returns: LeaveRequest DTO

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.GetLeaveRequestsForTimeEntryAsync(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Approved Leave Requests for a timecard week based on the date range.
member.accessComments: 1) Any authenticated user can view their own leave request information within the date range. 2) Timecard approvers(users with the permission APPROVE.REJECT.TIME.ENTRY) or their proxies can view the leave request information of their supervisees, within the date range.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing effective person Id
member.returns: List of LeaveRequest DTO

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.CreateLeaveRequestAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.HumanResources.LeaveRequest,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a single Leave Request. This POST endpoint will create a Leave Request along with its associated leave request details
member.accessComments: Any authenticated user can create their own leave request Supervisor can create leave requests on behalf of their supervisees The endpoint will reject the creation of a Leave Request if Employee does not have the correct permission.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing effective person Id
member.returns: Newly created Leave Request Object

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.CreateLeaveRequestStatusAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.HumanResources.LeaveRequestStatus,System.String)
member.summary: Create a Leave Request Status record.
member.accessComments: 1) Any authenticated user can create a leave request status record for their own leave request. 2) Leave approvers(users with the permission APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST) or their proxies can create a leave request status record for the leave requests of their supervisees.
member.param: Optional parameter - Current user or proxy user person id.
member.returns: Newly created Leave Request Status

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.GetSupervisorsByPositionIdAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the HumanResourceDemographics information of supervisors for the given position of a supervisee.
member.accessComments: Any authenticated user can access the HumanResourceDemographics information of their own supervisors.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing effective person Id.
member.returns: List of HumanResourceDemographics DTOs

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.GetSuperviseesByPrimaryPositionForSupervisorAsync(System.String)
member.summary: This end point returns all the supervisees for the currently authenticated leave approver. The endpoint will not return the supervisees if: 1. 403 - User does not have permission to get supervisee information
member.accessComments: Current user must be Leave Approver(users with the permission APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST) or their proxy to fetch all of their supervisees
member.param: Optional parameter for passing effective person Id
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned any unexpected error has occured.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user is not allowed to fetch supervisees.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.UpdateLeaveRequestAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.HumanResources.LeaveRequest,System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint will update an existing Leave Request along with its Leave Request Details.
member.accessComments: Any authenticated user can update their own leave request. Supervisor can update leave requests created by their supervisees The endpoint will reject the update of a Leave Request if the employee does not have a valid permission.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing effective person Id
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned if the leaveRequest DTO is not present in the request or any unexpected error has occured.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user is not allowed to update the leave request.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.NotFound returned if the leave request record to be edited doesn't exist in the DB.

HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Conflict returned if the leave request record to be edited is locked or if a duplicate leave request record already exists in the DB.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeLeaveRequestController.CreateLeaveRequestCommentsAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.HumanResources.LeaveRequestComment,System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint will create a new leave request comment associated with a leave request.
member.accessComments: 1) Any authenticated user can create a comment associated with their own leave request. 2) Leave approvers(users with the permission APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST) or their proxies can create a comment for the leave requests of their supervisees.
member.param: Optional parameter for passing effective person Id
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned any unexpected error has occured.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user is not allowed to create the leave request comment.

member.param: Optional parameter: employeeId for whom the leave request being shown.
member.returns: PositionPayPeriodsTimecards DTO

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.EmployeeSummaryController.QueryEmployeeSummaryAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.HumanResources.EmployeeSummaryQueryCriteria)
member.summary:
Gets a summary of employee information based on criteria provided.
The endpoint will not return the requested EmployeeSummary if: 1. 400 - criteria was not provided 2. 403 - criteria contains Ids that do not have permission to get requested EmployeeSummary 3. 404 - EmployeeSummary resources requested do not exist
member.param: Criteria used to select EmployeeSummary objects .
member.returns: A list of objects.
member.accessComments: When a supervisor Id is provided as part of the criteria, the authenticated user must have supervisory permissions or be a proxy for supervisor. If no supervisor Id is provided, only EmployeeSummary objects for the authenticated user may be requested

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.HumanResourcesController
member.summary: Expose Human Resources Employment Positions data and user permissions

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.HumanResourcesController.GetHumanResourceDemographicsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list filled with all of the HumanResourceDemographics the current user/user with proxy is able to access
member.param: Optional parameter for effective person Id
member.accessComments: 1. Any user can get a human-resources resource that represents their self. 2. Any non-supervisor user can access HumanResourceDemographics data of all their supervisors along with that of their own. 3. Any user with ViewAllEarningsStatements permission can acces HumanResourceDemographics data of all the employees along with that of their own. 4. Users who have the permission - ACCEPT.REJECT.TIME.ENTRY - are considered supervisors and can access the HumanResourceDemographics data of the following: a. Self b. All their supervisors c. All their subordinates d. All the supervisors of their subordinates 5. Users who are proxying for a supervisor (a user with the aforementioned permission) have the same authorization as the supervisor. When this is the case, set the effectivePersonId argument in the route url to the id of the supervisor.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.HumanResourcesController.GetHumanResourceDemographics2Async(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list filled with all of the HumanResourceDemographics the current user/user with proxy is able to access
member.param: Optional parameter for effective person Id
Optional lookback date to limit returned results
member.accessComments: 1. Any user can get a human-resources resource that represents their self. 2. Users who have the permission - ACCEPT.REJECT.TIME.ENTRY - are considered supervisors and can get resources owned by their supervisees. If a supervisor user attempts to get a resource owned by a non-supervisee, this endpoint will throw a 403. 3. Users who are proxying for a supervisor (a user with the afore mentioned permission) have the same authorization as the supervisor. When this is the case, set the effectivePersonId argument in the route url to the id of the supervisor. 4. Admin can access human-resources resource of anyone.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.HumanResourcesController.GetSpecificHumanResourceDemographicsAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a HumanResourceDemographics object for the person id in the route.
member.param: Id of the peron whose HumanResourceDemographics information requested
Optional parameter for passing effective person Id
member.returns: HumanResourceDemographics informaion of the requested person.
member.accessComments: 1. Any user can get a human-resources resource that represents their self. 2. Users who have the permission - ACCEPT.REJECT.TIME.ENTRY - are considered supervisors. These supervisors and their proxies can get resources owned by their supervisees. If a supervisor attempts to get a resource owned by a non-supervisee, this endpoint will throw a 403. 3. Users who have the permission - APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST - are considered leave approvers. These leave approvers and their proxies can get resources owned by their supervisees. If a leave approver attempts to get a resource owned by a non-supervisee, this endpoint will throw a 403.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.HumanResourcesController.QueryHumanResourceDemographicsAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.HumanResourceDemographicsQueryCriteria,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a collection of HumanResourceDemographics using a collectiong of Ids
member.param: An object that specifies search criteria
(Optional) ID of a grantor if the current user is acting as their proxy - must be their proxy
member.returns: The response value is a list of Person DTOs for the matching set of employees.
member.accessComments: Users may only access 1. Their own information 2. Their supervisees information if they have the APPROVE.REJECT.TIME.ENTRY permission 3. Their grantor's supervisees information when acting as a proxy for the grantor

member.summary: Gets a list of PayrollDepositDirectives for the Current User
member.returns: The Current User's PayrollDepositDirectives

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.GetPayrollDepositDirectiveAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a single PayrollDepositDirective from its record identifier. Requested resource must be owned by the current user.
member.param: The Id of the payroll deposit directive
member.returns: The requested payroll deposit directive

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.UpdatePayrollDepositDirectivesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayrollDepositDirective})
member.summary:
Updates a list of payroll deposit directives. Use this endpoint to batch update directives all at once. You must obtain an authentication token from the URI. Accept: application/vnd.ellucian-step-up-authentication.v1+json POST payroll-deposit-directives endpoint
The BankingAuthenticationToken.Token property is required in the X-Step-Up-Authentication header if account authentication is enabled.
member.param: A list of PayrollDepositDirectives containing the updates.
member.returns: The list of PayrollDepositDirectives with the successfully updated properties

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.UpdatePayrollDepositDirectiveAsync(System.String,Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayrollDepositDirective)
member.summary:
Updates a single PayrollDepositDirective. You must obtain an authentication token from the URI. Accept: application/vnd.ellucian-step-up-authentication.v1+json POST payroll-deposit-directives endpoint
The BankingAuthenticationToken.Token property is required in the X-Step-Up-Authentication header if account authentication is enabled.
member.param: The id of the directive being updated
member.returns: The updated PayrollDepositDirective

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.CreatePayrollDepositDirectiveAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayrollDepositDirective)
member.summary:
Create a payroll deposit directive. You must obtain an authentication token from the URI. Accept: application/vnd.ellucian-step-up-authentication.v1+json POST payroll-deposit-directives endpoint
The BankingAuthenticationToken.Token property is required in the X-Step-Up-Authentication header if account authentication is enabled.
member.returns: The created PayrollDepositDirective. Response Status will be 201 - Created

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.DeletePayrollDepositDirectiveAsync(System.String)
member.summary:
Deletes a single PayrollDepositDirective using its record identifier. You must obtain an authentication token from the URI. Accept: application/vnd.ellucian-step-up-authentication.v1+json POST payroll-deposit-directives endpoint
The BankingAuthenticationToken.Token property is required in the X-Step-Up-Authentication header if account authentication is enabled.
member.param: The Id of the directive to delete
member.returns: HTTP Status 204 - No Content

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.DeletePayrollDepositDirectivesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary:
Deletes one or more PayrollDepositDirective a list of record identifiers. You must obtain an authentication token from the URI. Each id must be provided in the request:
Example: 1. to delete a single PayrollDepositDirective use /payroll-deposit-directives?id=123 2. to delete multiple PayrollDepositDirectives use /payroll-deposit-directives?id=123&id=456
Accept: application/vnd.ellucian-step-up-authentication.v1+json POST payroll-deposit-directives endpoint
The endpoint will not delete the requested PayrollDepositDirective(s) if: 1. 400 - no ids are provided in the uri 2. 403 - User does not have permission to delete requested record ids 3. 403 - no BankingAuthenticationToken is povided 4. 404 - requested id(s) do not exist
The BankingAuthenticationToken.Token property is required in the X-Step-Up-Authentication header if account authentication is enabled.
member.param: The Id(s) of the directives to delete
member.returns: HTTP Status 204 - No Content

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.PostPayrollDepositDirectiveAuthenticationAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Post a request for authentication to create or update a PayrollDepositDirective. To create a directive, post authentication for the remainder directive.
member.param: id of the deposit directive to authenticate against
the authentication value, which should be the account id of the deposit directive specified by the id in the URI
member.returns: A BankingAuthenticationToken object. Tokens expire after ten (10) minutes.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.PostPayrollDepositDirectivesAuthenticationAsync
member.summary: Post a request for authentication to create a PayrollDepositDirective when an employee has no existing directives
member.returns: A BankingAuthenticationToken object. Tokens expire after ten (10) minutes.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayrollDepositDirectivesController.GetStepUpAuthenticationHeaderValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the token used for Step-Up Authentication
member.returns: The first X-Step-Up-Authentication header value, if present. Otherwise null.

member.summary: Pay Statements Controller routes requests for interacting with pay statements

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PayStatementsController.GetPayStatementSummariesAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of summaries of all pay statements for the current user, or, if you have the proper permissions, for any employee. A summary object corresponds to a pay statement record. You can use the id of the PayStatement in a request for a Pay Statement Report. Use the filter start and end dates to filter out A successful request will return a status code 200 response and a list of pay statement summary object.
member.param: optional: whether the employee has consented to viewing statements online
optional: the pay cycle in which the employee was paid that generated this statement
optional: the date the employee was paid
optional: start date to filter pay statements by
optional: end date to filter pay statements by
member.returns: An array of PayStatementSummary objects for the requested parameters
member.note: Pay Statements are cached for 24 hours.

member.returns: a single PDF containing the pay statements specified in the list of ids

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PersonEmploymentStatusesController.GetPersonEmploymentStatusesAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Get personEmploymentStatus objects. This endpoint returns objects based on the current user's/user with proxy's permissions.
member.accessComments: Example: If the current user is an admin, this endpoint returns the personEmploymentStatuses for the effectivePersonId Example: If the current user/user with proxy is an employee, this endpoint returns that employee's/proxied employee's personEmploymentStatuses Example: If the current user/user with proxy is a manager, this endpoint returns all the personEmploymentStatuses of the employees reporting to the manager Example: If the current user is a leave approver with the APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST permission, this end point returns the leave approver's PersonEmploymentStatus and personEmploymentStatuses of all the employees whose leave requests are handled by this leave approver.
member.param: Optional parameter for effective person Id
lookup start date, all records with end date before this date will not be retrieved
member.returns: A list of PersonEmploymentStatus objects

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PersonPositionsController.GetPersonPositionsAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Get PersonPosition objects. This endpoint returns objects based on the current user's permissions. Example: If the current user/user who has proxy is an employee, this endpoint returns that employee's/proxy's PersonPositions Example: If the current user/user who has proxy is a manager, this endpoint returns all the PersonPositions of the employees reporting to the manager Example: If the current user is an admin, this endpoint returns the PersonPositions for the effectivePersonId
member.param: lookup start date, all records with end date before this date will not be retrieved
member.returns: A list of PersonPosition objects

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.HumanResources.PersonPositionWagesController.GetPersonPositionWagesAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets PersonPositionWage objects based on the authenticated user's permissions.
member.accessComments: This endpoint returns PersonPositionWage objects based on the current authenticated user's permissions. Example: If the current user is an admin, this endpoint returns the PersonPositionWages for the effectivePersonId. Example: If the current user/user who has proxy is an employee, this endpoint returns that employee's/proxy user's PersonPositionWages. Example: If the current user/user who has proxy is a supervisor with the permission ACCEPT.REJECT.TIME.ENTRY, this endpoint returns the supervisor's PersonPositionWages and PersonPositionWages of all the employees reporting to this supervisor. Example: If the current user is a leave approver with the APPROVE.REJECT.LEAVE.REQUEST permission, this end point returns the leave approver's PersonPositionWages and PersonPositionWages of all the employees whose leave requests are handled by this leave approver.
member.param: Optional parameter for effective personId, which should be used when proxying on behalf of another user.
lookup start date, all records with end date before this date will not be retrieved
member.returns: A collection of PersonPositionWage objects

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Planning.AdviseesController.QueryAdviseesByPost2Async(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdviseeSearchCriteria,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Search advisees by their name or ID, or by their assigned advisor's name or ID. This returns a set of advisees. These searches can only be done by advisors or staff with permissions to view an appropriate group of advisees.
member.returns: All Advisees that matched the search criteria. Advisee privacy is enforced by this response. If any advisee has an assigned privacy code that the advisor is not authorized to access, the Advisee response object is returned with a X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of advisees. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the specific advisee object.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden exception returned if user does not have role and permission to access this advisor's data. No special role is needed to get this basic information.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest exception returned for any other unexpected error.
member.accessComments:
An authenticated user (advisor) with any of the following permission codes may query their own list of assigned advisees using the search criteria VIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES REVIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES
An authenticated user (advisor) with any of the following permission codes may search for any student using the search criteria VIEW.ANY.ADVISEE REVIEW.ANY.ADVISEE UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEE
Advisee privacy is enforced by this response. If any advisee has an assigned privacy code that the advisor is not authorized to access, the Advisee response object is returned with an X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of advisees. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the specific advisee object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Planning.PlanningApplicantsController.GetApplicantAcademicCreditsAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the academic history for the applciant. This retrieves all the raw academic credits which includes: Academic credits that were imported without aplicant being registered as student. Academic credits that were transfer or non-course credits. Academic Credits that were for the applicant when it was a student but later again became an applicant.
member.param: (Optional) used to filter to credits with status of Add, New, Preliminary, Non-Course, Transferm Withdrawn, dropped only.
(Optional) if filter is true and include dropped is also true then dropped academic credits will also be returned
member.returns: The list of Academic Credits for the applicant.
member.accessComments: Applicant academic history can be retrieved by: 1. An Applicant is accessing its own data 2. A user must be an applicant.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Planning.PlanningApplicantsController.GetApplicantProgramsAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets information the programs in which the specified applicant has applied for. Inactive programs are student programs with the status of Graduated, Withdrawn or InActive. includeInactivePrograms flag works in conjunction with currentOnly flag such as: When includeInactivePrograms is set to true and currentOnly flag is true then only those inactive programs that are not yet ended will be included whereas if currentOnly flag is false then all inactive programs will be included. When includeInactivePrograms is set to false but currentOnly is true then it means only those inactive programs that were ended in past, will be included.
member.param: Should inactive student programs be included (programs with status of Inactive/ withdrawn or STPR.END.DATE is in past)
Boolean to indicate whether this request is for active student programs, or ended/past programs as well
member.returns: All Programs in which the specified applicant filled the application for.
member.accessComments: Applicant programs information can be retrieved only if: 1. An applicant is accessing its own data. 2. A user is an applicant.

User with VIEW.STUDENT.INFORMATION permission 4. User is a proxy user

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Planning.PlanningStudentsController.QueryPlanningStudentsAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.PlanningStudentCriteria)
member.summary: Retrieves a planning student Dtos containing fewer properties than student Dtos for the specified list of student ids
member.returns: List of Planning Students
member.accessComments:
Student information can be retrieved only if: 1. An Advisor with any of the following codes is accessing the student's data if the student is not assigned advisee. VIEW.ANY.ADVISEE REVIEW.ANY.ADVISEE UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEE 2. An Advisor with any of the following codes is accessing the student's data if the student is assigned advisee. VIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES REVIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES 3. A user with permissions of VIEW.PERSON.INFORMATION and VIEW.STUDENT.INFORMATION is accessing the student's data.
Student privacy is enforced by this response. If any student has an assigned privacy code that the requestor is not authorized to access, the response object is returned with an X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of students. In this situation, all details except the student name are cleared from the specific student object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.AdvisorsController.GetAdvisorAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves basic advisor information, such as advisor name. This is intended to retrieve merely reference information for a person who may have currently or previously performed the functions of an advisor. Use for name identification only. Does not confirm authorization to perform as an advisor.
member.param: Id of the advisor to retrieve
member.returns: An Advisor object containing advisor name
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden exception returned if user does not have role and permission to access this advisor's data. No special role is needed to get this basic information.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest exception returned for any other unexpected error.
member.accessComments: Any authenticated user can retrieve advisor name and professional email information.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.AdvisorsController.QueryAdvisorsByPostAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.AdvisorQueryCriteria)
member.summary: Retrieves basic advisor information for a the given Advisor query criteria (list of advisor ids). Use for name identification only. Does not confirm authorization to perform as an advisor. This is intended to retrieve reference information (name and professional email) for any person who may have currently or previously performed the functions of an advisor. If a specified ID not found to be a potential advisor, does not cause an exception, item is simply not returned in the list. NOTE: The AdvisorQueryCriteria object has a property indicating whether to retrieve OnlyActiveAdvisees, however, since the Advisor DTO is name/email info only this property has no effect on the results.
member.param: Criteria of the advisors to retrieve
member.returns: A list of Advisors object containing advisor name
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden exception returned if user does not have role and permission to access this endpoint. Advisor permissions required.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest exception returned for any other unexpected error.
member.accessComments: Any authenticated user can query advisor name information.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.AdvisorsController.QueryAdvisorsByPost2Async(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Retrieves basic advisor information for a the given Advisor query criteria (list of advisor ids). Use for name identification only. Does not confirm authorization to perform as an advisor. This is intended to retrieve merely reference information (name and professional email) for any person who may have currently or previously performed the functions of an advisor. If a specified ID not found to be a potential advisor, does not cause an exception, item is simply not returned in the list.
member.param: Advisor IDs for whom data will be retrieved
member.returns: A list of Advisors object containing advisor name
member.accessComments: Any authenticated user can query advisor name information.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.AdvisorsController.GetAdviseesPreferredEmailsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of preferred email addresses for all of an advisor's current student advisees.
member.returns: A list of email addresses
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden exception returned if user does not have role and permission to access this advisee data.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized exception returned if user's Colleague Session has expired.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest exception returned for any other unexpected error.
member.accessComments:
An authenticated user (advisor) with any of the following permission codes may retrieve their own list of assigned advisees VIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES REVIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES VIEW.ANY.ADVISEE REVIEW.ANY.ADVISEE UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEE
Advisee privacy is enforced by this response. If any advisee has an assigned privacy code that the advisor is not authorized to access, the Advisee response object is returned with an X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of advisees. In this situation, the advisee's email address is not included in the list of email addresses returned.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.AdvisorsController.GetAdvisees2Async(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves an advisor's list of assigned advisees.
member.param: If true, only current advisees are returns - this excludes former advisees and future advisees.
member.returns: A list of Advisees including associated program and approval request status for each advisee. Advisee privacy is enforced by this response. If any advisee has an assigned privacy code that the advisor is not authorized to access, the Advisee response object is returned with a X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of advisees. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the specific advisee object.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden exception returned if user does not have role and permission to access this advisee data.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest exception returned for any other unexpected error.
member.accessComments:
An authenticated user (advisor) with any of the following permission codes may retrieve their own list of assigned advisees VIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES REVIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES VIEW.ANY.ADVISEE REVIEW.ANY.ADVISEE UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEE
Advisee privacy is enforced by this response. If any advisee has an assigned privacy code that the advisor is not authorized to access, the Advisee response object is returned with an X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of advisees. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the specific advisee object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.AdvisorsController.GetAdvisee2Async(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an advisee for this advisor if advisor has required permission.
member.returns: An Advisee including associated program and approval request status. Advisee privacy is enforced by this response. If an advisee has an assigned privacy code that the advisor is not authorized to access, the Advisee response object is returned with a X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the response object.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden exception returned if user does not have role and permission to access this advisee data.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest exception returned for any other unexpected error.
member.accessComments:
An authenticated user (advisor) may retrieve an advisee from their own list of assigned advisees if they have one of the following 4 permissions: VIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES REVIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES
An authenticated user (advisor) may retrieve any advisee if they have one of the following 4 permissions: VIEW.ANY.ADVISEE REVIEW.ANY.ADVISEE UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEE
Advisee privacy is enforced by this response. If the advisee has an assigned privacy code that the advisor is not authorized to access, the Advisee response object is returned with an X-Content-Restricted header with a value of "partial" to indicate only partial information is returned for some subset of advisees. In this situation, all details except the advisee name are cleared from the specific advisee object.

member.summary: Retrieves permissions for the current user to determine which functions the user is allowed, such as ability to advise all students or only their own advisees, or whether advisor can just view or may also update a advisee's plan.
member.returns: List of strings representing the permissions of this user
member.accessComments: Users may retrieve their own advising permissions

member.summary: Returns the advising permissions for the authenticated user.
member.returns: Advising permissions for the authenticated user.
member.accessComments: Users may retrieve their own advising permissions

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.DegreePlansController
member.summary: Provides access to get and update Degree Plans.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.DegreePlansController.QueryCurriculumTracksForStudentByProgramAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.CurriculumTrackQueryCriteria)
member.summary: Retrieve all curriculum track codes available for a student for a given academic program code.
member.param: A curriculum tracks used to retrieve Curriculum Tracks.
member.returns: A collection of curriculum tracks for student and a given program code.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.NotFound returned if a curriculum track is not found, either for the specified student and program
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned if the student id or program code is not provided.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user does not have the role or permissions required
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned for other errors that may occur
member.accessComments:
A student may view available curriculum tracks for their catalog.
Anauthenticateduser(advisor)withanyofthefollowingpermissioncodesmayview program curriculum tracks for one of their assigned advisees VIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES REVIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES
Anauthenticateduser(advisor)withanyofthefollowingpermissioncodesmayview program curriculum tracks for any advisee VIEW.ANY.ADVISEE REVIEW.ANY.ADVISEE UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEE

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.DegreePlansController.PutApplySampleAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Planning.LoadDegreePlanRequest)
member.summary: Applies a sample degree plan to the degree plan and updates it in the database.
member.param: The Load DegreePlan request specifying which sample plan to load into the degree plan
member.returns: The updated degree plan
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.NotFound returned if a sample degree plan is not found, either for the specified program or a default sample

HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Conflict returned if version number of passed degree plan object does not match the version in the database, indicating that an update has occurred on the degree plan by another user and this action has not been saved.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user does not have the role or permissions required to update the degree plan
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned for other errors that may occur
member.accessComments: A user may apply a sample degree plan to their own plan. Anauthenticateduser (advisor)witheither UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES or ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEESpermissionmayapply a sample plan to any of their assigned advisees. Anauthenticateduser(advisor)witheither UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE or ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEEpermissionmayapply a sample plan to any of their assigned advisees.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.DegreePlansController.GetSamplePlanPreviewAsync(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a student degree plan preview given a sample degree plan for the supplied program. The student's plan is unchanged in the database.
member.param: The degree plan id of the plan to use as the basis for the plan preview.
The program from which the sample plan should be derived.
member.returns: A degree plan preview which contains both a limited preview of courses suggested along with a version of the student's DegreePlan now including the overlaid sample degree plan.

HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned if the degree plan id or programCode is not provided.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user does not have the role or permissions required to view the degree plan
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned for other errors that may occur
member.accessComments:
A student may view their own sample plan preview.
Anauthenticateduser(advisor)withanyofthefollowingpermissioncodesmayview a sample plan preview for one of their assigned advisees VIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES REVIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES
Anauthenticateduser(advisor)withanyofthefollowingpermissioncodesmayview a sample plan preview for any advisee VIEW.ANY.ADVISEE REVIEW.ANY.ADVISEE UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEE

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.DegreePlansController.GetSamplePlanPreview8Async(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a sample degree plan (curriculum track) for the given curriculum track code, using the provided term code as the first term. The student's plan is unchanged in the database.
member.param: The degree plan id of the plan to use as the basis for the plan preview.
The code of the curriculum Track from which the sample plan will be derived.
The code for the term at which to start the sample plan
Academic program to evaluate when considering the student's academic history
member.returns: A degree plan preview which contains both a limited preview of courses suggested along with a version of the student's DegreePlan now including the overlaid sample degree plan. Header X-Content-Restricted with a value of "partial" will be returned if the caller is a student working with their own plan. It indicates that any RestrictedNotes are removed from the return object.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.NotFound returned if a sample degree plan is not found, either for the specified program or a default sample
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned if the degree plan id or programCode is not provided.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user does not have the role or permissions required to view the degree plan
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned for other errors that may occur
member.accessComments:
A student may view their own sample plan preview.
Anauthenticateduser(advisor)withanyofthefollowingpermissioncodesmayview a sample plan preview for one of their assigned advisees VIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES REVIEW.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES UPDATE.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES ALL.ACCESS.ASSIGNED.ADVISEES
Anauthenticateduser(advisor)withanyofthefollowingpermissioncodesmayview a sample plan preview for any advisee VIEW.ANY.ADVISEE REVIEW.ANY.ADVISEE UPDATE.ANY.ADVISEE ALL.ACCESS.ANY.ADVISEE
When the caller is a student working with their own plan, header X-Content-Restricted with a value of "partial" will be returned to indicate that any RestrictedNotes are removed from the return object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignmentsController.PostHousingAssignmentAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Create a new housing assignment in the target system.
member.param: Set to true if the box number supplied in the AddressBoxNumber attribute is already formatted. Otherwise set to false or do not include the parameter. If true, Colleague will not apply its own formatting to the supplied value, such as adding the word box as a prefix.

If true, Colleague will not automatically create a box number if configured to do so. There will be no box number for the created housing assignment. If passed as false or not included, this parameter has no effect. This cannot be set to true if a value is supplied in the AddressBoxNumber attribute. This cannot be set to true unless Colleague is configured to maintain addresses with housing assignments.
member.returns: The resulting housing assignment
member.accessComments: Requires permission CREATE.UPDATE.HOUSING.ASSIGNMENTS. The user will be able to create housing assignments for all people.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignmentsController.PutHousingAssignmentAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Update an existing housing assignment in the target system. The existing housing assignment must be specified by Id and/or External Id. All attributes of the existing housing assignment will be overwritten with the attributes supplied to this API. An attribute that is supported, but is not supplied to the API, will be treated as a blank value and overwrite the corresponding attribute in the existing record with a blank, with the exception of Box Number. A blank Box Number is ignored, and separate "Remove Box Number" flag is available.
member.param: Set to true if the box number supplied in the AddressBoxNumber attribute is already formatted. Otherwise set to false or do not include the parameter. If true, Colleague will not apply its own formatting to the supplied value, such as adding the word box as a prefix.

Set to true to remove the existing box number on the housing assignment. Otherwise set to false or do not include the parameter. This cannot be set to true if a value is supplied in the AddressBoxNumber attribute. This cannot be set to true unless Colleague is configured to maintain addresses with housing assignments.
member.returns: The resulting housing assignment
member.accessComments: Requires permission CREATE.UPDATE.HOUSING.ASSIGNMENTS. The user will be able to update housing assignments for all people.

member.summary: Get a housing assignment by the system id
member.param: The system id of the housing assignment
member.returns: The resulting housing assignment
member.accessComments: Requires permission VIEW.HOUSING.ASSIGNMENTS. The user will be able to view housing assignments for all people.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Student.AddAuthorizationsController.PutAddAuthorizationAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AddAuthorization)
member.summary: Update an existing add authorization record.
member.param: Dto containing add authorization being updated.
member.returns: Updated AddAuthorization DTO.
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user does not have the role or permissions required to update an add authorization for this section.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Conflict returned if the record cannot be updated due to a lock.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned if invalid student id or student locked or any other creation problem.
member.accessComments: This action can only be performed by: 1. a student who is assigning themselves to a previously unassigned add authorization code, or 2. a faculty member assigned to the section,or 3. a departmental oversight member assigned to the section may update an add authorization for a section with the following permission code CREATE.SECTION.ADD.AUTHORIZATION

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Student.AddAuthorizationsController.GetSectionAddAuthorizationsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves Add Authorizations for a specific section
member.returns: The Add Authorizations for the section.
member.accessComments: 1. Only permitted for faculty members assigned to the section. 2. A departmental oversight member assigned to the section may retrieve add authorization information with any of the following permission codes VIEW.SECTION.WAITLISTS VIEW.SECTION.ADD.AUTHORIZATIONS CREATE.SECTION.ADD.AUTHORIZATION

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Api.Controllers.Student.AddAuthorizationsController.PostAddAuthorizationAsync(Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AddAuthorizationInput)
member.summary: Create a new add authorization for a student in a section.
member.param: Add Authorization Input with information on creating a new authorization.
member.returns: Newly created Add Authorization.
An HttpResponseMessage which includes the newly created add authorization
member.exception: HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Forbidden returned if the user does not have the role or permissions required to create an add authorization for this section.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.Conflict returned if an unrevoked authorization already exists for the student in the section.
HttpResponseException with HttpResponseMessage containing HttpStatusCode.BadRequest returned if any other creation problem.
member.accessComments: This action can only be performed by: 1. a faculty member assigned to the section. 2. a departmental oversight member assigned to the section may create an add authorization for a section with the following permission code CREATE.SECTION.ADD.AUTHORIZATION
